articles.title: "Pretty Close": Anil Kumble Reacts To Jasprit Bumrah Mimicking His Bowling Action - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah is known for bowling toe crushing yorkers and sharp bouncers, but who knew that the pacer can pretty much ace the bowling action of Anil Kumble.
articles.content: India pacer Jasprit Bumrah's imitation of Anil Kumble's bowling action has got the latter impressed, as he said the fast bowler was "pretty close" in pulling off the action. Bumrah is known for bowli… [+2227 chars]
